definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Mrs Dalloways is one of the typical works on stream of consciousness by Virginia Woolf.
sentences.chinese: 《达罗卫夫人》是伍尔夫意识流小说的经典之作。

sentences.english: These latent impressions help consciousness flow from one tranquil moment to the next.
sentences.chinese: 这些智识将会帮助意识流延续其自身的平静。

sentences.english: The stream in which the swimmer courses represents a stream of consciousness expressed in hand signs.
sentences.chinese: 图中游泳者顺沿而下的河流中手的符号表示了意识流。

sentences.english: Interest in your stream of consciousness takes you to awareness.
sentences.chinese: 对本身意识流的兴趣会将你导向觉性。

sentences.english: Do you like fictions of stream of consciousness?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢阅读意识流小说吗？

sentences.english: The revelation of "inward turning"is the appearance of psychological novel and stream-of-consciousness novel.
sentences.chinese: 内转的具体表现是心理小说和意识流小说的产生。

sentences.english: An article about “the stream of consciousness” and that does not belong to Kundera.
sentences.chinese: 一篇有关意识流以及意识流不属于米兰昆德拉的文章。

sentences.english: An article about “the stream of consciousness” and that does not belong to Kundera.
sentences.chinese: 一篇有关意识流以及意识流不属于米兰昆德拉的文章。
